mapper.insert: insert into sc_party_dues (party_member_id, due_stage, pay_date, salary, house_fund, medical_insure, tax, car_subsidy, fringe_allowance, pension, annuity, deduction, pay_proportion, payable_due, pay_due, create_time, creator_id, creator_name, modify_time ) values (#{partyMemberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dueStage,jdbcType=DATE}, #{payDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{salary,jdbcType=REAL}, #{houseFund,jdbcType=REAL}, #{medicalInsure,jdbcType=REAL}, #{tax,jdbcType=REAL}, #{carSubsidy,jdbcType=REAL}, #{fringeAllowance,jdbcType=REAL}, #{pension,jdbcType=REAL}, #{annuity,jdbcType=REAL}, #{deduction,jdbcType=REAL}, #{payProportion,jdbcType=REAL}, #{payableDue,jdbcType=REAL}, #{payDue,jdbcType=REAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select: select party_member_id, due_stage, pay_date, salary, house_fund, medical_insure, tax, car_subsidy, fringe_allowance, pension, annuity, deduction, pay_proportion, payable_due, pay_due, create_time, creator_id, creator_name, modify_time from sc_party_dues
